Class Main_Controller

  • Object
    • Main_Controller

  • public class Main_Controller
extends Object
    This class is the Controller class for the main.fxml file. It controls the flow of the GUI between different states of mesh processing.
    Author:
    carolinesmith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void check_Finished()
      This methods is called after 7 minutes of background task execution: if the task is still running the GUI presents to the user the options to continue processing or cancel.
      void continue_Processing()
      This method is called when the user chooses to continue with mesh processing/ It is called from a button that is presented after 7 minutes processing.
      void handle_fileProblem()
      This method updates the GUI when there is a problem with the file detected during mesh processing.
      void handle_InterruptedExeption()
      This method is called when there is an Interrupted Exception during proecssing - it alerts the user through the GUI.
      void handle_IOException()
      This method updates the GUI when there is an IOException during mesh processing.
      void initialize()
      This methods lays out the GUI on main.fxml loading and lays out the second tab with a web view engine - that runs the Hololens web app from Immanuel Baskaran: https://goshmhif.azurewebsites.net/Hololens-Webapp/#/add
      Boolean open_glbViewer()
      This methods open a gltf2 viewer in a browser where user can drag and drop the new .glb file to view the mesh
      void process_Mesh()
      This method checks that a file has been selected (and that the file paths for the command are set).
      void refresh_Page()
      This method updates the GUI when the applciation is refreshed or a mesh processing is cancelled.
      void select_Mesh()
      This method is called when the users clicks to upload a file It opens a file chooser and gets the path and file selected.
      void show_File()
      This method opens a file chooser to show the user the processing file after completion of processing.
      void start_Background_Task()
      This method starts the background task by creating a new thread that takes the static instance of BackgroundTask.java as parameter and calling 'start()'.
      private void updateLabels_Failed()
      This method updates the GUI on unsucesful completion of mesh proessing.
      private void updateLabels_Success()
      This method updates the GUI on successful completion of mesh processing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Main_Controller

        public Main_Controller()

    • Method Detail

      • select_Mesh

        public void select_Mesh()
        This method is called when the users clicks to upload a file It opens a file chooser and gets the path and file selected. If the file is not of type .stl an alert is presented to user and the operation aborted. Otherwise the selection is used to set the file paths in the shell command in Command.java

      • process_Mesh

        public void process_Mesh()
        This method checks that a file has been selected (and that the file paths for the command are set). If they are it calls 'build_Command_From_Selection' in Command.java. It updates the GUI that mesh processing has been started - stopwatch gif is presented and lables are set. Then after a second delay (to allow GUI to be set) the background task is called (to process the mesh)

      • start_Background_Task

        public void start_Background_Task()
        This method starts the background task by creating a new thread that takes the static instance of BackgroundTask.java as parameter and calling 'start()'. It checks for the status of the task on completion - if success then 'updateLabel_Succes()' is called, if IOException then 'handle_IOException()' is called, if InterruptedException then 'handle_InterruptedException()' is called. A timeline (timeline_Cancel) is also played whilst the task is in execution - This calls 'check_Finished' after 7 minutes if task is still in execution.

      • check_Finished

        private void check_Finished()
        This methods is called after 7 minutes of background task execution: if the task is still running the GUI presents to the user the options to continue processing or cancel. If continue the timeline is played again. If cancelled the timeline is stopped.

      • updateLabels_Success

        private void updateLabels_Success()
        This method updates the GUI on successful completion of mesh processing.

      • updateLabels_Failed

        private void updateLabels_Failed()
        This method updates the GUI on unsucesful completion of mesh proessing.

      • show_File

        public void show_File()
        This method opens a file chooser to show the user the processing file after completion of processing.

      • open_glbViewer

        public Boolean open_glbViewer()
        This methods open a gltf2 viewer in a browser where user can drag and drop the new .glb file to view the mesh
        Returns:

      • continue_Processing

        public void continue_Processing()
        This method is called when the user chooses to continue with mesh processing/ It is called from a button that is presented after 7 minutes processing.

      • handle_InterruptedExeption

        public void handle_InterruptedExeption()
        This method is called when there is an Interrupted Exception during proecssing - it alerts the user through the GUI.

      • handle_fileProblem

        public void handle_fileProblem()
        This method updates the GUI when there is a problem with the file detected during mesh processing.

      • handle_IOException

        public void handle_IOException()
        This method updates the GUI when there is an IOException during mesh processing.

      • refresh_Page

        public void refresh_Page()
        This method updates the GUI when the applciation is refreshed or a mesh processing is cancelled. It also resets all the static variables that build the shell command, stops the timeline that is played during processing and calls 'cancel()' on the background task thread.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This methods lays out the GUI on main.fxml loading and lays out the second tab with a web view engine - that runs the Hololens web app from Immanuel Baskaran: https://goshmhif.azurewebsites.net/Hololens-Webapp/#/add
